key_risks: Financial instability and insolvency concerns due to layoffs and inability to secure sufficient funding
Regulatory and certification challenges with EASA and FAA
Technological and market risks including underestimation of hover time and uncertain market adoption
Legal and securities issues with multiple class-action lawsuits
Environmental and safety concerns regarding energy consumption and infrastructure development
controversies: Subsidiaries filing for insolvency and significant layoffs
Class-action lawsuits alleging securities law violations
Debates over the environmental impact and safety of eVTOL aircraft
environmental_issues: Environmental impact of large-scale eVTOL operations, including energy consumption and infrastructure development
social_issues: Layoffs affecting approximately 1,000 employees, representing the bulk of the workforce
governance_issues: Legal issues and securities law violations leading to class-action lawsuits
